response.original_title: Littlest Pet Shop - Strike A Pose!
response.overview: In this exciting volume of the Littlest Pet shop Blythe tries to recruit the Biskit Twins to the mathletes. After realising they don't spend enough time together Blythe's dad decides to organise a day of father daughter time, much to Blythe's embarrassment. Pepper is ecstatic when her comedy idol comes for a visit, but is she trying too hard and not being true to herself? The hunt is on for Mrs. Twombly's missing glasses, but when the culprit is a charming squirrel can Blythe and Pepper help rehabilitate the compulsive hoarder?
response.title: Littlest Pet Shop - Strike A Pose!
